SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Animator
Class that manages sprite animations for game objects.
Circle
Class that creates and manipulates circles.
ColliderCircle
Class that represents a collider for a circle object.
ColliderPolygon
Class that represents a collider for a polygon object.
GameEngine
Class that represents the GameEngine.
GameObject
Class that represents a game object.
GeometricFigure
Abstract class that represents a geometric figure.
GeometryUtils
Class with utility methods for solving geometric problems.
GUI
Class that represents the main GUI window for the game engine.
IBehaviour
Interface for game object behaviors.
ICollider
Interface for colliders in the game engine.
IGameObject
Interface for game objects in the engine.
InputEvent
Class that encapsulates input events for keyboard and mouse.
ITransform
Interface for object transformations.
LayerGroup
Class that represents a group of game objects on a specific layer.
Point
Class that defines a point in the Cartesian and polar planes.
Polygon
Class that creates and manipulates polygons.
Segment
Class that represents a line segment defined by two points.
Shape
Class that represents a drawable shape with image, size, and offset.
ShapeFactory
Factory class for creating Shape objects based on type and scale.
Transform
Class that represents a transformer for an object.
